EmailTemplate.name: Compliance Survey Follow Up Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Completed with Follow Up - {!Response__c.First_Name__c} {!Response__c.Last_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: {!Response__c.First_Name__c} {!Response__c.Last_Name__c} has completed the {!Response__c.Survey__c} and has indicated potential code of conduct violations. You can find the Compliance Response record here: {!Response__c.Link}
